fields_of_interest: Budget, Trade, Competition, Environment, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: EU-Qatar Comprehensive Air Transport Agreement negotiations, EU regulatory and aeropolitical affairs
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
position: Senior Vice President Aeropolitical and Corporate Affairs
goals__remit: Qatar Airways is the national air carrier of the State of Qatar. Headquartered in the Qatar Airways Tower in Doha, the airline operates a hub-and-spoke network, linking over 150 international destinations across Africa, Central Asia, Europe, Far East, South Asia, Middle East, North America, South America and Oceania from its base at Hamad International Airport, using a fleet of 200 aircraft.
